Anatoly Nevzorov

Hello! My name is Anatoly and I am an experienced Front-End developer with over 3 years of experience in building websites and web applications using Vue.js, Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Git, PHP.

I am always looking to improve my skills and stay up to date with the latest technologies, including frontend and backend development. In addition to my technical expertise, I am also skilled in communication, collaboration, problem-solving, and adaptability. These soft skills have helped me effectively work with clients and team members on a variety of projects.

I am very passionate about using technology to solve problems and make a positive impact, and I would be excited to join a company that is doing meaningful work. I am open to remote or full-time work opportunities and am eager to contribute my skills and experience to a dynamic team.
